name: Arches National Park
address: Arches National Park Entrance Rd, Moab, UT 84532
description: Home to over 2,000 natural sandstone arches, including the world-famous Delicate Arch. Offers numerous hiking trails and viewpoints.

name: Canyonlands National Park
address: Grand View Point Rd, Moab, UT 84532
description: Utah's largest national park, featuring dramatic desert landscapes carved by the Colorado River and its tributaries.

name: Dead Horse Point State Park
description: Offers breathtaking panoramic views of the Colorado River and Canyonlands National Park from 2,000 feet above.

name: Delicate Arch Trail
description: A popular 3-mile roundtrip hike leading to the iconic Delicate Arch, especially stunning at sunset.

name: Slickrock Bike Trail
description: World-renowned challenging 10.5-mile loop trail for mountain biking over petrified sand dunes.

name: Colorado River Rafting
description: Experience thrilling whitewater rafting or scenic calm water floats through majestic canyons on the Colorado River.

name: Hell's Revenge 4x4 Trail
address: Sand Flats Recreation Area, Moab, UT 84532
description: An iconic and challenging off-road trail for 4x4 vehicles and UTVs, known for its steep climbs and descents on slickrock.

name: Corona Arch Trail
description: A moderate 3-mile roundtrip hike to the impressive Corona Arch and nearby Bowtie Arch.
